title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Flipped Learning-Based Neuroscience Module for Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain core neuroscience concepts (synapses, neurotransmitters, brain structures) and apply them to elementary education contexts.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans through flipped learning and complete over 80% of pre-class materials.
Learners can design and implement neuroscience-related educational projects (e.g., brain health campaigns) via PBL activities and receive peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
